name: Best costume or outfit
description: Awarded to the picture with the best individual costume outfit
nominees: The outfit Little Nai Nai wears at the hospital at the start of the Farewell. With the flowery smock and mad cap, The Farewell
The COS new season arrivals i.e. outfits worn by the dead on all souls' day, November
Peter and Paul's matching white outfits, Funny Games
Frederic Bourdin's Emily Bell Hodgson outfit when meeting the Barclays, The Imposter
